attributes.action: Ammend the regulations covering entitlement to the Blue Badge Parking Scheme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are many persons claiming the higher component of  disability living allowance(care) who are not entitled to tme mobility allowance.

Because of this they are then overlooked for the Blue Badge Parking Scheme.  This I regard are discrimination.

My 6 yr old son suffers with Crohns Disease which is a life long illness.  He is entitled to DLA care component.

However when hre relapses which is often he will need a toilet at a moments/no notice.  Often I have received parking tickets for these stops.

This is unacceptable and I ask that each case be treated on its merits.
